item.title: Adding player ingame time

item.description:
@LearningToCode1 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:4, topic:450935”]How do peeople copy and paste command prompts? I can’t copy mines…[/quote]Right click ur command prompt > It will say “Mark” > Click “Mark” > Slide ur mouse over whatever u wnna copy, Then last click enter when u got what u wnna copy

item.title: Adding player ingame time
item.dc:creator: @LearningToCode1 LearningToCode1
item.description:
@LearningToCode1 wrote:

Use this, The problem with your one is both codes are missing " after the brackets

characterfile.write("play-time = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.pTime), 0, Integer.toString(p.pTime).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Here u go this one should work mate.

Edit: I think i’m wrong with this actually, Have you added the int for this code…?

Read full topic
